root.name: Xenosaga I+II
root.description: OverviewXenosaga I+II is a Nintendo DS compilation and remake of the first two episodes of the PlayStation 2 Xenosaga trilogy; Der Wille zur Macht and Jenseits von Gut und Bose. Despite Namco having localized both PS2 titles for North America, this DS remake was never released outside of Japan.

similar_games.game: Dragon Ball Z: Attack of the Saiyans
